title: The best honeymoon hotels in Edinburgh
text:
The best honeymoon hotels in Edinburgh The Witchery by the Castle is the ultimate romantic hideaway. Linda Macdonald , Destination expert 14 February 2017 • 11:33am 
A n insider's guide to the top honeymoon hotels in Edinburgh, including the best for comfy beds, baths for sharing, decadent interiors, romantic restaurants and fabulous views, in central locations near Edinburgh Castle. Edinburgh, Scotland   If a hotel can be the soul of discretion, this quietly confident hotel is it — this place is for those who want luxury that whispers, rather than shouts. Taking in two pretty-as-paint Georgian townhouses the aim is sustained, serious-minded luxury. Rooms feature plenty of toned-down tweed, some attractive and unusual furnishings (Art Deco Chinoiserie, anyone?) and an occasional, eye-popping splash of colour. Because of restrictions on listed buildings there are no lifts and room sizes vary wildly, from the perfectly adequate ‘petite doubles’ to over-the-top ‘Jacuzzi suites’, with stops at ‘executive rooms’ and ‘suites’ on the way. Soft throws to snuggle under, a carefully curated selection of quality books and delightfully old-fashioned wooden shoehorns are nice touches.   98 per night
